movie.title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
movie.plot: Fred Rogers used puppets and play to explore complex social issues: race, disability, equality and tragedy, helping form the American concept of childhood. He spoke directly to children and they responded enthusiastically. Yet today, his impact is unclear. Have we lived up to Fred's ideal of good neighbors?

events.title: Kiranjit Ahluwalia sets fire to her husband while he sleeps

movie.title: Provoked: A True Story
movie.plot: Provoked is the true story of Kiranjit Ahluwalia, a Punjabi woman who moved to London after her marriage with Deepak Ahluwalia. Her husband seemed caring at first but then began to beat her up. He started drinking a lot and sleeping around with other women. he also subjected her to spousal rape. After ten years and having two children with him, out of fear, she sets him on fire.

movie.title: Dear Mr. Gacy
movie.plot: A chronicle of the interaction between college student Jason Moss and the object of his obsession, serial killer John Wayne Gacy.

studios.title: Province of British Columbia Film Incentive BC
The Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

events.title: Jan Lewan's wife wins the Mrs. Pennsylvania contest

movie.title: The Polka King
movie.plot: Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.

movie.title: Mars Attacks!
movie.plot: 'We come in peace' is not what those green men from Mars mean when they invade our planet, armed with irresistible weapons and a cruel sense of humor.  This star studded cast must play victim to the alien’s fun and games in this comedy homage to science fiction films of the '50s and '60s.
